alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 8:54PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cameron and southeastern Calcasieu Parishes through 930 PM CDT... At 854 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hacketts Corner, or 7 miles southeast of Lake Charles Regional Airport, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Sweet Lake, Gibbstown, Hacketts Corner, and Holmwood. This includes Interstate 210 between mile markers 5 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis
